Class Unit

java.lang.Object
units.Unit
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attackable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AntiArmoredUnit, ArmoredUnit, MeleeUnit, RangedUnit
public abstract class Unit extends Object implements Attackable
The unit which will available to attack opponent units or base. Unit should never be instantiated into objects, as it is only designed to be a base class.

  • Constructor Details

    • Unit

      public Unit(int hp, int attack, int speed, int cost, int range, double trainingTimeSeconds)
      Initializes a new unit with specified base attribute and training time.

      Sets hp and maxHp to hp * 1.5 if upgradedHp is true. Otherwise, sets hp and Maxhp to the hp parameter. Sets attack to attack * 1.2 if upgradedAttack is true. Otherwise, sets attack to the attack parameter. Sets coordinate to 0. Sets trainingTime to trainingTimeSeconds in nanoseconds. Sets the remaining fields to given parameters.

      Parameters:
      hp - The hp of the unit.
      attack - The attack of the unit.
      speed - The speed of the unit.
      cost - The cost of the unit.
      range - The attack range of the unit.
      trainingTimeSeconds - The time to train of the unit.

  • Method Details

    • calculateDamage

      public abstract int calculateDamage(Attackable target)
      This method will call when the unit need to calculate damage deals to the target.
      Parameters:
      target - The unit or base which is about to take damage.
      Returns:
      The damage deals to the target

    • attack

      public int attack(Attackable target)
      Returns the amount of damage the target is taken.
      Parameters:
      target - The unit or base which is attacked.
      Returns:
      The damage that target is taken from calculateDamage method.

    • canAttack

      public boolean canAttack(long now)
      Determines whether this unit can perform an attack at the given time.

      An attack is allowed only if the cooldown period has elapsed since the previous attack. When an attack is permitted, the last attack timestamp is updated to the provided time.

      Parameters:
      now - the current time in nanoseconds, typically obtained from System.nanoTime()
      Returns:
      true if the unit can attack at this time; false otherwise

    • takeDamage

      public int takeDamage(int baseDamage)
      Reduce unit's hp by damage from the calculation. Calculate by rounding baseDamage multiply by 0.75 + (0.5 * random double in range of 0.0 <= value < 1.0).
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in interface Attackable
      Parameters:
      baseDamage - The base amount of damage received.
      Returns:
      The actual damage which comes from the calculation.

    • isAlive

      public boolean isAlive()
      Check whether the unit is alive or not.
      Specified by:
      isAlive in interface Attackable
      Returns:
      true if unit's hp is more than 0, false otherwise.
